Description: Technology company engaged in development in the field of augmented and mixed reality. We are developing platforms for children and adults.
Full Description: Devar changes the space around children and adults with the help of augmented reality. We are about emotions, safety, and necessity. Our goal is to change the life through helpful reality, which will make things around us more useful, more efficient and more convenient. We are building a window from the real world into the world of AR-content that meets the basic needs of the Man.  Devar for kids. Learn. Share. Discover. ​ Safe AR-environment for the child. Education, development. A network of AR characters, historical personalities, interesting people, idols who are friends, teachers, coaches, mentors, assistants of the child on the path of development and knowledge of the world. A person's personality is formed by the environment. Devar creates the best environment for today's child, using technology in a useful cognitive way, directly influencing personal development. It protects the child from harmful things, warning about the consequences of their use. Everyday objects around the child acquire new properties. Books, toys, clothes - everything becomes part of the learning process. Devar as an environment forms an individual trajectory of development, taking into account the child's age, previous knowledge, preferences, country, and environment. This is a platform of edutainment content for the children and their family. Edutainment at home and with friends, Education at school and with teachers. Feeler. Emotion. Feeling. Connection.  Joy. Impressions. Surprise. Emotions and feelings are an integral part of our everyday communication. We build relationships through them. We share them. Feeler is an interactive personal communication environment where you can exchange precious moments of life with your friends and family. Communication through feelings. Augmented Reality messenger, in which people give and receive emotions. Feeler is not just a way to visualize a product, it is an opportunity for deep native communication, creating space around a person who learns the world through a camera. This is the place where brands and people connect, the place where the main feelings are revealed. Feeler opens the way to the user when he is most attentive. This is a way to reach users when they perceive the world through the camera. At that moment, when they are most focused and their attention is tied to what is happening around. This is an opportunity not to attract, but to get into the person's vision and become a conductor of the feelings and emotions/share the feelings and emotions. This is a place of imagination, self-expression, and creativity. The connection between the world of things and the world of emotions. Feeler is changing the lives of people, discovering new ways to communicate through immersive technology. Connection. Immersion. Feelings.

Description: The Web Development Bootcamp
Full Description: Devatory, the Web Development Laboratory, is a coding, programming, and web development boot camp, focusing on JavaScript, HTML5, and ASP.NET MVC4 with C#, located in Oak Brook, IL - Chicago's most practical hands-on development boot camp. We think everyone should learn to code. In the information age, coding is the tool that can bring your ideas to life. The world has changed and software has become essential in basically every field. Having the ability to write software will place you in front of those who can't write software much like those who are literate have the advantage over those who are illiterate. As Steve Jobs said:  "Everybody in this country should learn how to program a computer...because it teaches you how to think." Learn to code in 10 weeks from experienced instructors... In 10 intense weeks, you will take a journey like no other. With the help of our world-class instructors instructors and teamwork with your peers, you will learn to be a great web developer. Learning to code takes hard work and an intense passion to learn. Our hands-on, in-the-trenches approach is the best way to learn this stuff. Anyone can be a hobbyist coder. But here at Devatory, you can become a professional. You can transform your life and get a high-paying job doing something fascinating.

Description: Devbility is a computer application that helps hiring managers to test the coding skills of prospective hires.
Full Description: Devbility is a computer application that helps hiring managers to test the coding skills of prospective hires. It runs coders through tests to determine their strengths, weaknesses, and abilities. Users have the ability to view the results, interview coders with the top scores, and hire with confidence knowing they’re the professionals they claim to be. Devbility is based in California.

Description: Developing Minds Software enables families, non-profits, and education institutions collect and record data related to disabled children.
Full Description: Developing Minds Software offers solutions that enable families, non-profits, and education institutions collect and record data related to disabled children. The company’s product, DDtrac, enables practitioners to systematically collect data, assess student progress, and adapt student programs to changing needs. It also helps educators and therapists provide more efficient treatment and education plans thereby improving the outcomes of children and adults with cognitive impairment.  Developing Minds Software was founded by Dawn Gregg in December 2005 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

Description: DevelopIntelligence provides learning solutions for hundreds of thousands of engineers for over 250 global brands.
Full Description: DevelopIntelligence leads technical and software development learning programs for Fortune 5000 companies. We provide learning solutions for hundreds of thousands of engineers for over 250 global brands.

Description: Platform for ongoing skills-transfer mentoring
Full Description: DevGo is an interactive platform for skills-transfer mentoring education services. Live, small group classes simultaneously pair pre-recorded expert curriculum with highly attentive instructor-mentors. Outside of class, mentors and learners connect on-demand for Q&A, accountability check-ins, practicing concepts on real projects, peer-reviews, and more.

Description: An industry-leading code school nestled in tech hubs throughout the US. Our expert faculty empower the next generation of makers and coders.
Full Description: We are an intense, coding school/boot-camp where students are trained and mentored by industry experts to learn the very crucial skill of development. Our curriculum, in web, iOS, and UX  courses, focuses on hands-on learning over old-school lectures. Our goal is to be the most accessible and impactful coding bootcamp in the nation by empowering our students to learn, live, build, and give.

Description: A coding bootcamp teaching web & mobile development through full and part-time classes
Full Description: Learn to code in 11 intense weeks. This is an immersive in-person coding bootcamp teaching industry leading technologies like Ruby, Rails, JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3 in Downtown Salt Lake City, Utah. We offer both part-time and full-time classes.  This is an accelerated program for anyone who is pivoting their career into web development or for entrepreneurs to build their ideas.
